entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
